action.action-desc: Mr. Duncan (for himself and Ms. DelBene) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to remove cost-sharing responsibilities for chronic care management services under the Medicare program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Chronic Care Management Improvement Act of 2023.

section.header: Removing cost-sharing responsibilities for chronic care management services under part B of the Medicare program
section.text: Section 1833 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395l) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (GG), by striking and at the end; and

in subparagraph (HH), by inserting before the semicolon at the end the following: and (II) with respect to chronic care management services (as described in subsection (b)(8) of section 1848) furnished on or after January 1, 2024, the amount paid shall be an amount equal to 100 percent of the lesser of the actual charge for such services or the amount determined under such section;; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), in the first sentence—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (12), by striking and at the end; and

in paragraph (13), by inserting before the period at the end the following: , and (14) such deductible shall not apply with respect to chronic care management services (as described in section 1848(b)(8)) furnished on or after January 1, 2024.
